features: FLUSHABLE, BIODEGRADABLE, LARGE, SUPER SOFT & PLANT-BASED FIBERS: Large 7.1"x7.1" wipes for ONE wipe clean!
WATER-BASED, FRAGRANCE-FREE BABY WIPES: Simple 99% water and naturally-derived ingredients for sensitive baby skin on hands, face, body and bottoms.
SAFE & GENTLE ON BABIES' SKIN: Provide gentle cleaning for baby’s most delicate skin with Hypoallergenic wipes that are free of any harsh chemicals.
CLEAN BABY CARE: SAFE & GENTLE ON BABIES' SKIN. NO alcohol, chlorine, dioxides, dyes, parabens, phthalates, phenoxyethanol or fragrances.

HeroLife delivers clean, plant-based skin care, body care, hair care and wellness supplements to an increasing population of consumers who demand high-performing, natural, premium products for a healthier lifestyle. Our commitment doesn’t end when your product arrives at your door. We’re fully dedicated to your complete satisfaction. If you have any questions or concerns about your order, please contact us at any time. We are here to assist with all your needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HEROLIFE Probiotics Baby Wipes gently cleanse, hydrate and soothe delicate baby skin. The fragrance-free, hypoallergenic, plant-based probiotic formula helps to strengthen skin barrier for optimal skin health.

You take special care of your baby. We help you with clean, gentle baby care! HEROLIFE baby products are tested by pediatricians and dermatologists for safety and efficacy. Gentle formulas are made with plant-based ingredients that are safe, hypoallergenic, pH-balanced, cruelty-free and made without harsh chemicals.
Flushable Baby Wipes Gently Cleanse & Protect Made with 99% water, these soft, large wipes help keep baby clean from top to bottom.

Herolife Probiotics Baby Shampoo Herolife Probiotics Baby Lotion Herolife Baby Oil Herolife Probiotics Baby Wipes Herolife Flushable Baby Wipes Clean Baby Care ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Plant-Based ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Probiotics ✓ ✓ ✓ Sustainable ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic & pH Balanced ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Available in Multi-Packs ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought these to carry in my purse!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these wipes to carry in my purse for those times when we need to use public restrooms. I simply wipe down seat and handles and feel at ease!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very helpful for 5 yr old
reviews.reviewText: My 5yr old has a problem with wiping and sensitivity after going potty. They make her feel like she’s actually a big girl now and doesn’t feel she needs to have an adult help her. They also don’t irritate her and are flushable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mold and contamination? If you don’t want a rash, don’t buy these.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these three different times. I purchased the three pack each time. The last two, three packs I purchased had these black and brown spots all over the wipes. I contacted the company trying to figure out what they are! They don’t seem to know… Before I noticed the spots, I used some of them and I now have a rash on my hands and.. elsewhere… I also purchased a pack of their feminine and probiotics wipes from Walmart ( they claim they don’t sell in Walmart. But they do) weird. But I had a similar experience with those wipes as well. Please be aware of this if you choose to buy these. There’s something seriously wrong with the formula or the way they are stored. I believe this is mold and it’s really disturbing…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: But wish they were a little bigger and thicker. But they clean nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a Good Product
reviews.reviewText: One of my old dogs pees on the back of his front legs when he goes outside. I have to be able to grab a wipe whenever we go outside. I love the fact that the packaging is recyclable, but the wipes are a challenge to get out singly. The recyclable part far outweighs the challenge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the worst...
reviews.reviewText: ...but not the best either. They tear super easy and considering hot tightly they're packed, they get rips and holes just taking them out. I do love that they're biodegradable, however I still would never flush them due to the ability to clog in the short term.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a good product, fun using it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars These are not flushable
reviews.reviewText: All the wipes want to come out at once, and rip while you're doing it. They are large and wet. But they do not dissolve in the toilet.

I’ve just opened a new package of wipes & they are moldy. While they are flushable they are very difficult to remove from package & impossible to just pull out one. Access hole should definitely be bigger. Just a better non-moldy wipe would be great.
